titles: A nevve ballade intituled, Agaynst rebellious and false rumours To the nevve tune of the Blacke Almaine, vpon Scissillia.
Newe ballade intituled, Agaynst rebellious and false rumours.
author: Bette, Thomas.
publisher: In Fletestreat at the signe of the Faucon by VVylliam Gryffith, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Sainct Dunstones Churchyarde,
notes: Verse - What rumores now are raised of late".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
